process.name: collections/show/1
process.xml:
<record xmlns="http://localhost/documents/" name="collections/show/1" recordType="Collection" public="0" featured="0">
    <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
      <element name="Title">
        <data>Collection Test (import of Omeka Xml)</data>
      </element>
    </elementSet>
  </record>

process.name: items/show/1
process.xml:
<record xmlns="http://localhost/documents/" name="items/show/1" recordType="Item" collection="collections/show/1" public="0" featured="1">
    <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
      <element name="Title">
        <data>Basic</data>
      </element>
    </elementSet>
    <record name="files/show/1" recordType="File" file="::ExampleBasePath::/Basic/Image_Basic_1.jpg"/>
    <record name="files/show/2" recordType="File" file="::ExampleBasePath::/Basic/Image_Basic_2.png"/>
  </record>

process.name: items/show/2
process.xml:
<record xmlns="http://localhost/documents/" name="items/show/2" recordType="Item" public="1" featured="0">
    <elementSet name="Dublin Core">
      <element name="Title">
        <data>Root</data>
      </element>
    </elementSet>
    <record name="files/show/3" recordType="File" file="::ExampleBasePath::/image_Root_1.png"/>
    <record name="files/show/4" recordType="File" file="::ExampleBasePath::/image_Root_2.png"/>
  </record>
